mapper.select: SELECT id, name, album_num_limit, picture_storage_limit, create_time, update_time FROM [role] WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, role_id, space_usage, album_count, picture_count, picture_group_count, create_time, update_time FROM [user] WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, password, role_id, space_usage, album_count, picture_count, picture_group_count, create_time, update_time FROM [user] WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [user](username, password, role_id) VALUES(#{user.username}, #{user.password}, (SELECT id FROM role WHERE role.name = #{rolename}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE [user] SET album_count = (SELECT count(*) FROM album WHERE owner_id = #{userId}), picture_group_count = (SELECT count(*) FROM album, picture_group WHERE album.owner_id = #{userId} AND picture_group.album_id = album.id), picture_count = (SELECT count(*) FROM album a, picture_group pg, picture_ref pr WHERE a.id = pg.album_id AND pr.picture_group_id = pg.id), space_usage = ISNULL((SELECT sum(pi.file_size) FROM album a, picture_group pg, picture_ref pr, picture_identity pi WHERE a.id = pg.album_id AND pr.picture_group_id = pg.id AND pr.picture_id = pi.id), 0) WHERE id = #{userId}
